title: Lending Light
description: "Sometimes my imagination bleeds into reality."Eleven years ago a serial killer menaced the Nettlebush Indian Reservation. Rafael Gives Light is his son. A loner, Rafael relies on his startlingly overactive imagination to escape the distrust and vitriol of his peers.In the summer of 2000 an exceptionally blond boy moves to Nettlebush.
